sustainabilityTabContent: WE CARE: Items with other sustainable properties that go beyond our minimum standards are marked with the WE CARE label.CERTIFIED SUSTAINABLE FIBRE:When it comes to certified sustainable fibres, we're committed to using natural fibres from renewable sources. The raw materials are cultivated via resource-saving methods. This product supports economically, ecologically and socially sustainable cotton farming. The sourcing of sustainable cotton follows the principle of mass balance. You can find more information here.
